mentionedBy.name: Snowflake Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Emphasizes lakehouse architecture, large-scale data engineering, and AI workloads vs Snowflake's data warehousing focus. Delta Lake provides ACID transactions on data lakes. Unity Catalog offers unified governance. Charges based on Databricks Units ($0.07-$0.55 per DBU-hour) plus cloud infrastructure costs

mentionedBy.name: Teradata Corporation

mentionedBy.name: Teradata Corporation
mentionedBy.notes: Top alternative and major competitive threat currently raising $10B at $62B valuation. Databricks Data Intelligence Platform is the leading Teradata Vantage alternative, risking customer acquisition during Teradata's cloud migration cycles
